abstract: The European Commission continued to flex its antitrust muscles, officially blocking U.P.S.’s $6.9 billion bid to buy the Dutch shipping company TNT Express, a deal that collapsed weeks earlier in the face of regulatory resistance.
snippet: The European Commission continued to flex its antitrust muscles, officially blocking U.P.S.’s $6.9 billion bid to buy the Dutch shipping company TNT Express, a deal that collapsed weeks earlier in the face of regulatory resistance.
lead_paragraph: BRUSSELS — The European Commission continued to flex its antitrust muscles on Wednesday, officially blocking U.P.S.’s $6.9 billion bid to buy the Dutch shipping company TNT Express.

headline.main: Europe Officially Blocks U.P.S. Takeover of TNT Express
